'''METW: Moria''' is a game card from the set ''[[Middle-earth: The Wizards]]'', for [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game|MECCG]].

'''''Note:''''' ''"Moria" refers to [[Moria]] of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]].''

==Card text==

*'''''Nearest Haven:''''' [[METW: Lórien|Lórien]]
*'''''Playable:''''' Items (minor, major, greater, gold ring) 
*'''''Automatic-attacks:''''' Orcs - 4 strikes with 7 prowess

''"In the pale ray of the wizard's staff...glimpses of stairs and arches, and of other passages and tunnels..."'' '''''-[[The Lord of the Rings|LotRII]]'''''
